targets.rawSql: SELECT issue_count as 'Issue Count', pull_request_count as 'PR Count', fork_count as 'Fork Count', star_count as 'Star Count', contributor_count as 'Contributor Count' FROM openalysis.`groups` WHERE name = 'cloudwego' LIMIT 50

SELECT
    DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(contributions) DESC) AS 'Rank',
    login AS 'Name',
    SUM(contributions) AS 'Contributions'
FROM
    openalysis.contributors
GROUP BY
    login
ORDER BY
    SUM(contributions) DESC;

SELECT
    IF(`rank` <= 10, location, 'Others') AS Location,
    SUM(occurrences) AS Count
FROM (
    SELECT
        location,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS `rank`,
        COUNT(*) AS occurrences
    FROM (
        SELECT
            node_id,
            location
        FROM
            openalysis.contributors
        WHERE
            location <> '' AND location IS NOT NULL
        GROUP BY
            node_id, location
    ) AS unique_contributors
    GROUP BY
        location
) AS ranked_locations
GROUP BY
    IF(`rank` <= 10, location, 'Others')
ORDER BY
    SUM(occurrences) DESC;

SELECT
    IF(`rank` <= 10, company, 'Others') AS Company,
    SUM(occurrences) AS Count
FROM (
    SELECT
        company,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS `rank`,
        COUNT(*) AS occurrences
    FROM (
        SELECT
            node_id,
            company
        FROM
            contributors
        WHERE
            company <> '' AND company IS NOT NULL
        GROUP BY
            node_id, company
    ) AS unique_contributors
    GROUP BY
        company
) AS ranked_locations
GROUP BY
    IF(`rank` <= 10, company, 'Others')
ORDER BY
    SUM(occurrences) DESC;

SELECT c.login AS `Name`,
       COUNT(DISTINCT i.id) AS `Issue Count`,
       COUNT(DISTINCT p.id) AS `PR Count`
FROM openalysis.contributors c
LEFT JOIN openalysis.issues i ON c.node_id = i.author_node_id
LEFT JOIN openalysis.pull_requests p ON c.node_id = p.author_node_id
GROUP BY c.node_id
HAVING `Issue Count` > 0 OR `PR Count` > 0;

panels.title: CloudWeGo Family Contributor Issue & PR Count

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  assignee_login as `Assignee`,
  issue_repo_name as `Repo`,
  issue_url as `Issue URL`,
  issue_number as `Issue Number`
FROM
  openalysis.issue_assignees;

SELECT
    c.login AS `Name`,
    GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(r.owner, '/', r.name) SEPARATOR ', ') AS `Project Involved`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT r.node_id) AS `Count`
FROM contributors c
JOIN repositories r ON c.repo_node_id = r.node_id
GROUP BY c.login;

SELECT
  assignee_login as `Assignee`,
  pull_request_repo_name as `Repo`,
    pull_request_url as `PR URL`,
  pull_request_number as `PR Number`
FROM
  openalysis.pull_request_assignees;

    created_at
FROM openalysis.repositories
WHERE name = 'hertz';
